entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison mentioned as a place where the boy's companions want to be sent. ("Throw us in to Azkaban")

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: A person who received applause from the crowd. ("The crowd around the walls began to clap as it had for Bagman")

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A person addressed by a woman with heavy-lidded eyes. ("Crouch! Throw us in to Azkaban")

relationships.description: The crowd applauded for Bagman. ("The crowd around the walls began to clap as it had for Bagman")
Crouch was addressed to send people to Azkaban. ("Crouch! Throw us in to Azkaban")
The woman with heavy-lidded eyes addressed Crouch. ("The woman with the heavy-lidded eyes looked up at Cr ouch and called")
The woman with heavy-lidded eyes wants to be sent to Azkaban. ("Throw us in to Azkaban")
